meanings.definition: The area visible from a specific vantage point.
meanings.sent1: From the top of the hill, the viewshed included the entire valley below.
meanings.sent2: The viewshed from the lookout tower encompassed miles of forest and mountains.
meanings.sent3: The viewshed from the treehouse made it easy to spot passing birds.
meanings.sent4: Her viewshed of the city skyline was uninterrupted by any tall buildings.
meanings.sent5: The viewshed from the airplane window revealed a patchwork of fields and rivers below.

meanings.definition: The extent of land or landscape that can be seen from a particular location.
meanings.sent1: Standing on the cliff, his viewshed stretched out to the horizon.
meanings.sent2: The viewshed from the balcony overlooked the bustling city streets.
meanings.sent3: The viewshed from the park bench allowed for peaceful people-watching.
meanings.sent4: The viewshed of the ocean from the lighthouse was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The viewshed of the mountains from the train window was awe-inspiring.
